ygData.subject: RE: New monk questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You will probably be better off with leather at first, at least as far as ac goes.  By the time your level starts getting into the teens you should have
ygData.messageBody:
> Hail Fellow Monks,
> �� This is my first time as a monk and I have several questions.� Any
> help would be great appreciated.
> �
> 1. I know that will less weight we have a higher AC.� But where is the
> balance of weigh and armor.� Am I better off with all Leather because
> of its higher AC or and I better off with all cloth because of its
> lower weight?
>
You will probably be better off with leather at first, at least as far
as ac goes. By the time your level starts getting into the teens you
should have replaced it all with mesh.
> �
> 2.� When I am ready to upgrade armor from either cloth or leather
> armor, depending� on the answers I get for number 1, what should I
> get?� I know there is netted, mesh, and woven but what is best to get
> first?� What are the advantages of each?�
>
Mesh is best, woven second best, netted worst. Only real difference is
the AC. Get mesh whenever you can, either buy it from other players, or
get it from the Gaz and higher frogloks in Guk.
> �
> 3. When I am ready where is the best place to get magic gloves?�
>
Guk is the place, or buy netted, woven, or mesh gloves from a player.
> �
> 4. When I hit level 17 and get feign death how many points should I
> put into it?� Should I just put one and then start it and sit there
> till it maxes or won't that work?�
>
You probably dont need to train it at the guild, but on the other hand,
you'll probably not have anything else to do with the training points
anyway. I trained mine up until I thought the price wasn't worth it.
Then sit somewhere and max it out.
> �
> 5.�What am I forgetting about?� What is important for me to remember
> or keep held back for later?� Should I save all my practice points for
> one thing?� Etc...
>
I use my practice points on the new skills as I reach the necessary
level, because there's nothing else i want to use them for. You dont
need to though.

Seani on Veeshan
